languages.text: "Вот ты и исторг{mf||ла} мои сомнения, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Я сделаю то, что должно — верующие святого Друза помогут тебе в битве".

traits.locale_text: "Вот ты и исторг{mf||ла} мои сомнения, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Я сделаю то, что должно — верующие святого Друза помогут тебе в битве".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Now you have banished my doubt. I will do what must be done. Saint Drusus's faithful will aid you in battle."
languages.original_text: "Вот ты и исторг{mf||ла} мои сомнения, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Я сделаю то, что должно — верующие святого Друза помогут тебе в битве".

traits.locale_text: "Now you have banished my doubt, my {mf|son|daughter}. I will do what must be done. Saint Drusus's faithful will aid you in battle."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Now you have banished my doubt, my {mf|son|daughter}. I will do what must be done. Saint Drusus's faithful will aid you in battle."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Now you have banished my doubt, my {mf|son|daughter}. I will do what must be done. Saint Drusus's faithful will aid you in battle."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Now you have banished my doubt, my {mf|son|daughter}. I will do what must be done. Saint Drusus's faithful will aid you in battle."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Now you have banished my doubt. I will do what must be done. Saint Drusus's faithful will aid you in battle."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Now you have banished my doubt. I will do what must be done. Saint Drusus's faithful will aid you in battle."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “你已经消除了我的疑虑。我会把必须做的事情做好，圣德鲁苏斯的信徒会协助你参加战斗。”
languages.original_text: "Now you have banished my doubt. I will do what must be done. Saint Drusus's faithful will aid you in battle."

traits.locale_text: “你已经消除了我的疑虑，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}。我会把必须做的事情做好，圣德鲁苏斯的信徒会协助你参加战斗。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「お前は私の迷いを払ってくれた。私はやるべき事をやる。聖ドルススの忠実な信者が、戦場であなたを助けるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Now you have banished my doubt. I will do what must be done. Saint Drusus's faithful will aid you in battle."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は私の迷いを払ってくれた。私はやるべき事をやる。聖ドルススの忠実な信者が、戦場であなたを助けるだろう」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «Ha despejado mis dudas. Haré lo que hay que hacer. Los fieles de san Drusus le ayudarán en la batalla».
languages.original_text: "Now you have banished my doubt. I will do what must be done. Saint Drusus's faithful will aid you in battle."

traits.locale_text: «Ha despejado mis dudas, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}. Haré lo que hay que hacer. Los fieles de san Drusus le ayudarán en la batalla».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Nun habt Ihr meine Zweifel verbannt. Ich werde tun, was getan werden muss. Die Anhänger des Heiligen Drusus werden Euch im Kampf unterstützen."
languages.original_text: "Now you have banished my doubt. I will do what must be done. Saint Drusus's faithful will aid you in battle."

traits.locale_text: "Nun habt Ihr meine Zweifel verbannt, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}. Ich werde tun, was getan werden muss. Die Anhänger des Heiligen Drusus werden Euch im Kampf unterstützen."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Vous avez dissipé mes doutes. Je ferai ce qui doit être fait. Les fidèles de Saint Drusus se joindront à vous au combat. »
languages.original_text: "Now you have banished my doubt. I will do what must be done. Saint Drusus's faithful will aid you in battle."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez dissipé mes doutes, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}. Je ferai ce qui doit être fait. Les fidèles de Saint Drusus se joindront à vous au combat. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Zihnimdeki şüpheleri bertaraf ettin. Yapılması gerekeni yapacağım. Aziz Drusus'un takipçisi, savaşında sana destek olacak."
languages.original_text: "Now you have banished my doubt. I will do what must be done. Saint Drusus's faithful will aid you in battle."

traits.locale_text: "Zihnimdeki şüpheleri bertaraf ettin. Yapılması gerekeni yapacağım. Aziz Drusus'un takipçisi, sana savaşında destek olacak."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
